spec_data.Name: perl-Regexp-Assemble
spec_data.Description:
Regexp::Assemble takes an arbitrary number of regular expressions and
assembles them into a single regular expression (or RE) that matches all
that the individual REs match.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:30:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Assemble multiple Regular Expressions into a single RE
